page.title: 11NEWS IN EXMOUTH
page.content: The {local}news paper report on all the current events in the area such as fetes,carnivals,weddings,council meetings and emergencies. The major news topics at the moment are the new swimming pool and the 325 people that have died in the aeroplane crash off the coast of Ireland. A new holiday brochure is out and they are looking for a pretty girl to go on the front cover. The newspaper make most of their money by selling advertisng space. A whole page of advertsements would cost Â£2.50. If someone wanted to sell something they would have to pay 10p per word. That is why people don't put very big{advertisements}in the papers. The publishers sell the papers to the news agents for 9p but the news agents sell them for 12p so they make 3p profit.
